sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2008/L.16), the SBSTA notes progress made in the EGTT s work and the interim reports by its Chair on performance indicators, financing options and a long-term strategy to facilitate the development, deployment, diffusion and transfer of technologies (FCCC/SB/2008/INFs 6-8).
The SBSTA also requests the EGTT to take into consideration the deliberations among parties at this session when preparing the final versions of these reports.
